Key: (Yoshino has been acting weird lately.)

(Normally, she is reserved, choosing not to
express something even if bothered her.)
So, what's going on?

That's what I'm asking! Why are you taking
me away without any explanation? And what
the hell is he doing here, anyway?!

...I mean, what reason would Kannazuki-san
have for being at our school?

My duties are best served at the immediate
side of the commander.
That's not what I'm talking about.
This is an emergency. It can't be helped.
...An emergency? What's going on?

Lately, or whenever Yoshino and you started
getting closer, she's become more unstable.
...Really?

Just so you know, our machines aren't broken.
Shido, don't tell me you did the unspeakable―
N-No, I didn't! I swear I didn't!

But Commander, Shido-kun and Yoshino-san
are an item, so their activities shouldn't result
in instability.
I'm not talking about that!
OW! Thank you!

(Kotori drop-kicked Kannazuki-san before
turning around to face me. He dropped to
the floor, grinning in ecstasy like a weirdo.)
Hey, Kotori.

It is true that you and Yoshino have been
getting much closer. There's no telling what
the future holds. Are you doing your job...?

Calm down, Kotori. Nothing fishy is going on.
I swear! I haven't done anything that you would
disapprove of!
Don't tell me you haven't kissed yet.
No, we haven't...

I suppose there was a chance that would
happen. Shido, something between you
and Yoshino had to have caused this.

Like I said, our relationship is totally healthy
and wholesome! We've gone on dates, but all
we do is talk, eat, and hang out!

(Kotori glanced over at Kannazuki-san while
he played with some device.)

Commander, it seems as though Shido-kun
is speaking the truth.

I see. He really didn't do anything... Or Shido's
doing something so unspeakable that he has
convinced himself it is okay.

What is that machine?! I don't know how else
to convince you!

Then, explain why Yoshino may be stressed.
Um, the two of you like each other, right?
Y-Yeah, that's right.
So Yoshino-san didn't say anything to you?

Yeah. I mean, I noticed that Yoshino's been
acting strangely recently too.
(Kotori's eyebrow twitched.)

We're happy whenever we're together, but
there are times when I suspect Yoshino
might be forcing herself.
I see. So?

Well, that's what was bothering me. I was
asking myself how I need to proceed, and
that's when you called me in for a talk.
Hmph. I don't need to hear excuses.
You were the one who brought me here!

Commander, Shido-kun's picked up on the
fact something may disturbing her. That is
all the confirmation we need for now.

...You have a point. Guess I'll let this slide for
today.

(Kannazuki-san, for once in his life, gave a
level-headed opinion, to which Kotori had
reluctantly complied.)

Um, so is Yoshino okay? You mentioned that
she's unstable.

It's hard to say. Maybe it's not exactly an
emergency, but anything can be a trigger.
Got it. So we can't ignore it then.

The situation aside, the commander was
simply worried about you, Shido-kun―
You don't need to tell him that!
Thank you...!

Um. It looks like she got you pretty good there.
Are you okay...?

Fear not... If I were to die, I could be replaced
instantly.

(So he's a program. He's as happy as usual.
If he says he's fine, I'll leave it at that.)

...Hmph. Stupid Shido saying stupid things
and messing everything up. So stupid.

Stop calling me stupid. Anyways, there isn't
an immediate threat, is there? Can you trust
me with this?

Right. We have no choice, I guess. In the
meantime, we'll be observing her.

I feel terrible thrusting the burden onto you
in this dire time.

Right. We'll have to leave it to you, but if
anything happens, let us know at once.
Thanks, Kotori.
(I immediately gave Yoshino a call after that.)

Oh, um... Shido-san, you say you wanted to
talk.
Oh, are you finally confessing your feelings?\nYou two are already a thing, so maybe not.\nIs there something more important?
Well, it definitely is important.
What...? U-Um, does that mean...
Are we booking a temple or a church? Yoshino\ncould pull off either dress, but I personally\nthink a church is better―

No, that's not it! I'm not talking about the
future. I'm talking about right now.
Now...?

Yes. Yoshino, I sense there's something
bothering you.
U-Um, well...
You're not going to deny it, huh?
Yeah. I mean, Yoshino's totally smitten.\nOf course she's stressed. Shido-kun,\nyou feel the same, don't you?

I guess. Yoshino, does your stress have
anything to do with me?
Oh, well... Um...

Yoshino. If I did something to bother you,
you can talk to me about it.
Shido-san...

I want to help you, Yoshino. Whatever it
takes. Even if I'm not of any use, even then―
Um, well...
Hmm. There's nothing you can do for\nher, Shido-kun.
Y-Yoshinon?!
Is that true...?
Right. I mean, it's not necessarily your job\nto fix it, know what I mean?
I don't really follow. Am I involved at all?
Yes, y-you are...
Then, would you tell me?
W-Well, it's embarrassing.
(I gasped.)

Oh, I'm sorry! If you're uncomfortable talking
about it, I don't want to force you.
Don't worry. It's not the kind of embarrassing\nyou might be thinking.
Oh. That's a relief.
But maybe her worries play into it a bit.
So what's the issue?!

I-I don't know how to put it, but what made
you think I was stressing, Shido-san?

Well, I noticed you behave a little differently.
I got worried, so I wanted to wait until you
were ready to talk about it.

(I knew Yoshino wasn't ready to talk about
it, but Kotori had to bring it up. So I decided
this use this opportunity to ask.)
Um, well, p-please don't laugh, okay?
Yeah. I won't.
I-I know... th-this isn't a big deal to you...
But I'm small...

Yeah, but you're not much shorter than
Kotori. What's wrong with that?
Oh, um...
Because you're small...?
Basically, Yoshino thinks she's causing you\nstress because she looks really youthful. It's\nbeen a source of anxiety for her.
I see. Is that really something to worry about?

Y-Yes, it is...! I-I was... stressing so much
about it!
That's right, Shido-kun. It's kinda messed\nup for you to dismiss her concerns like that.

Sorry, I didn't mean to. I mean, I could see
how that might be stressful...
Um, Shido-san, does it really not bother you?

Now that you mention it, the thought never
even crossed my mind.
Really? You had better not be just saying that!
What's the point in lying about it?

(Well, there are moments when I hope others
don't get the wrong idea, but that's it.)

Don't tell me this is what the whole coffee
incident was about. Did you order it because
you were self-conscious about your height?
Um, well...
That's right. Isn't black coffee a mature drink?\nIf only she could learn to like it.

(I didn't have the heart that the thought itself
was a bigger indication of her maturity.)
I mean, there are other factors. She tried\nwearing more mature clothes, but there\naren't many she can get in her size.

Y-You don't have to disclose that...! If it
looked bad, I wouldn't have said anything...
I would've wanted to see it.
Ah, Shido-kun. You like the thought of\nYoshino in baggy clothes, huh?
Wh-What...? That's awkward...
Oh, um, well...

(I don't blame her for feeling self-conscious,
but I couldn't get myself to tell her not to
force it.)
But if you really wanted to see, then, um...
Hey, Yoshino? That's where you're wrong.
...! I'm wrong?

Yeah. Yoshino, you're adorable.
Almost too adorable for me.
I think you're too accommodating.
You are her boyfriend, Shido-kun. Would you\nbe happier if she listened to you?

Well, if it comes naturally, then sure. But
Yoshino, I feel like you're forcing yourself.
Forcing myself? I...

Are you forcing yourself to be more mature
because it bothered you so much?
Oh, well... That's because I want to be, so I...

Yoshino, if it means so much to you, I won't
say anything.

But listen to me, Yoshino. I've told you many
times that I don't expect you to act any kind
of way.

In fact, if it's distressing you, then that makes
me feel worse.

You don't mind how young I look...?
Would you still... have feelings for me?
I like how youthful you are.
I like you the way you are.
Actually, I like your child-like sense of wonder.
Huh...?
Shido-kun, be careful. You're flirting with\ndangerous territory.

Th-That's not what I meant! I mean, I like
the side of you that is interested in the world
around you.
But it's true that I want to be more mature...

Yeah. I like you the way you are, Yoshino.
But if you want to work on your maturity,
then I can help you.
Whoa. There it is! He's right. Maturity\ncomes with experience, Yoshino.

Okay... But it's true that I do want to be
more mature.
I see...

But if you're not embarrassed to be around me,
then is it okay... if we take our time?
Yeah. I don't care how long it takes.

I want to go on dates with you, and eat
parfaits instead of drinking coffee, and
drink juice, too.

Rather than look at clothes, we can look at
plushies. Is it okay... that I'm like this?
And that I'm with you?
Of course. I like you the way you are.

Sure, your tastes will change over time.
I don't expect either of us to be this way
forever.

But that's all part of it, you know? I feel like
when the time comes, I will still want to be
with you.
Shido-san...

Yes. I, too, want to be with you. Even if it
takes time, I want to be with you...!
WOOHOO! Now that's young love. You two\nare so perfect for each other. I'm so happy!
Hm... You think so? The thought... elates me.
If Shido-kun likes you the way you are,\nand means it, that's all that matters.
What would be awful is he said all those\nthings, then changed his mind in the future.\nThen all your stress would be vindicated.
That would never happen.
Sure～. You have to keep your word,\nor I won't let Yoshino stay with you.
I'll do my best to ensure you trust me.
Um... Thank you so much.

You're welcome. Then again, I have to hold
up my end of the bargain and make sure you'll
still want to be with me too.
Shido-san, you're.. fine the way you are, no?
Haha. You think so?
I do.
(Yoshino quietly nuzzled herself closer.)
Um, Shido-san, can I ask you a favor...?
Within reason, sure...
Could you stoop down, and... close your eyes?
...Sure.
(I did as she asked and shut my eyes.)

(Her fingers softly grazed my cheek, and
I felt her slow exhale.)
(I waited quietly...)
Mm...

(Then, I felt something soft press against my
forehead.)
...Yoshino?

Um, that was me... I wanted to express, in the
best way I could, how much I like you...

I-I tried my best, but... this is all I can
muster.
...Yoshino.
I-I'm sorry...
Why are you apologizing? Um, it makes me...
Oh...

I'm not upset at all. What is your problem,
Yoshinon?
Shido-kun, you're such a gentleman, but\nhow long will that last?

What are you talking about, Yoshinon?
I would never do anything to hurt Yoshino.
So you'll do anything if she wills it? Bold\nstatement, Shido-kun.
Cross my heart, hope to die.
(Yoshino blushed and looked me in the eye.)

Um, I'm still shy when it comes to taking
initiative, so this is the best I can do, but...

Shido-san, when it comes to you, I do not
mind whatever... you want to do with me.
S-So, I'll wait until you're ready...

(Hearing her express herself so directly
almost blew my mind, but it was a reminder
that I could never do anything to hurt her.)
Oh...
(I pulled Yoshino in close to me softly.)

(...and I gave her a gentle kiss on the
forehead.)
